name: Sirenhead 1980's
description:
V. 1.1.3

In this game you play as a hiker who gets stranded in the woods when your ATV runs out of gas. You must get back to your cabin before Sirenhead can catch you! Make sure you avoid the trees because you could get trapped or... worse.

  • To "escape" the player must touch the doorknob.
  • If you press controls on the main screen, press the "c" key to return to the main screen.

Leave a rating!
